title: Affiliate Program Manager (Impact.com + Affiliate Networks)
description:
We are looking for a Full or Part time Affiliate manager to help us grow our US based wellness company.



You might be our match if you…



1. Have hands-on experience with affiliate management platforms (
 experience preferred)

2. Enjoy building relationships and turning them into real results.

3. Feel comfortable digging into reports and spotting what’s working (and what’s not).

4. Can stay organized while juggling different partners and campaigns.

5. Are excited to help us grow Cabana’s affiliate program and make it something you’re proud to say you built.



Applications that follow the instructions below will be prioritized for review.



TO APPLY:

1. Subject line: Affiliate Program Manager

2. Experience: Share your background with affiliate program management (especially if you’ve used 
 or similar platforms).

3. Availability: Let us know your hours per week and your earliest start date.

4. Rate: Share your expected hourly rate in USD.

5. Prove your skills:

• A short example of an affiliate program or campaign you managed successfully (and the results you’re proud of).

• A sample affiliate outreach or recruitment
/message you’ve written.

6. Show your personality: Relationships are at the heart of this role, so we want your
 to feel natural and genuine. Forget the stiff cover letter vibes, impress us by showing off your real personality, the same way you’d charm a new affiliate partner.



Key Responsibilities:

• Manage the day-to-day operations of Cabana’s affiliate program

• Recruit, onboard, and support new affiliate partners

• Build strong relationships with brand aligned affiliates to drive growth

• Set up tracking links, monitor conversions, and manage payouts

• Analyze performance data and optimize campaigns for ROI

• Prepare performance reports and share insights with the team

• Research and test new affiliate platforms, tools, and opportunities



Qualifications:

• 2+ years of experience managing affiliate programs

• Hands-on experience with affiliate management platforms like 
 (preferred), Rakuten, Commission Junction, Partnerize etc.

• Strong communication, negotiation, and organizational skills

• Data-driven mindset and comfort working with reports

• Independent, resourceful, and proactive

• Friendly and high energy



Why work with Cabana:

• Work from anywhere you feel most inspired

• Enjoy a flexible schedule, with just a few overlapping US business hours for collaboration

• See your impact come alive as part of a fast-growing US wellness brand

• Do work that’s purposeful, stylish, and fun - because wellness should feel good for us too!



Role Overview:

You’ll own the management and growth of Cabana’s affiliate program, from onboarding partners to tracking performance and ensuring timely payouts. The ideal candidate has experience with networks like 
, Rakuten, Commission Junction, Partnerize etc. This is a strategic and hands-on role, ideal for someone who thrives on relationship management and data-driven growth.



About Cabana:

Cabana is where science meets style, a modern luxury wellness brand redefining what it means to look and feel your best. We offer science-backed treatments like GLP-1s and hormone therapies, helping people live with more confidence, energy, and ease.



We’re building something beautiful. At Cabana, you won’t just design visuals, you’ll help shape a world where wellness feels elevated, effortless, and deeply personal.

title: Google & Meta Ads Specialist
description:
Position Type: Full-time 

Location: Philippines (Remote)

Schedule: UK hours



About the Company



Our client is a UK-based full-service digital marketing agency with a strong focus on authenticity, creativity, and brand storytelling. They specialize in content creation, social media strategy, performance marketing, and influencer collaborations for the hospitality industry. With offices in Hampshire and London, the team works with clients across the UK to deliver impactful digital experiences that resonate with audiences and drive engagement.



About the Role



We’re looking for a performance-driven Google & Meta Ads Specialist who is both analytical and execution-focused. This role is ideal for someone who enjoys hands-on campaign management, thrives in a fast-paced agency environment, and understands how paid media fits into a broader brand and growth strategy.

You will focus primarily on Google and Meta Ads, contributing to campaign strategy, execution, analysis, and cross-team collaboration.



Responsibilities



- Google & Meta Campaign Management

- Day-to-day management of paid media campaigns, with 70% focus on Google and Meta Ads

- Plan, build, and launch campaigns aligned with ecommerce goals, audience strategies, and conversion objectives

- Execute structured A/B testing of creatives, audiences, bidding strategies, and landing pages

- Continuously monitor performance, pacing, and efficiency across CPC, CTR, CPA, ROAS, and other relevant KPIs

- Manage monthly campaign budgets ranging from $500 - 1,000 USD



Data Analysis & Reporting



- Analyze campaign data across Google Ads, Meta Ads, and Analytics tools to identify patterns and optimization opportunities

- Prepare clear weekly and monthly reports, highlighting insights, trends, and next steps

- Translate performance data into actionable recommendations for scaling and efficiency improvement



Cross-Team Collaboration



- Work closely with internal teams (creative, merchandising,
/CRM, operations) to ensure campaign alignment

- Communicate performance updates, testing insights, and optimization strategies clearly and proactively

- Support broader ecommerce initiatives through data-driven inputs and channel expertise





Technical & Operational Excellence



- Ensure accurate tracking setup, event configuration, and conversion integrity across platforms

- Conduct thorough QA on every campaign launch to maintain high accuracy and operational discipline

- Maintain organized documentation of testing frameworks, campaign changes, and results



Competencies and Qualifications



Must-Have



- 3+ years of hands-on experience managing Google Ads and Meta Ads in an agency or performance-driven environment

- Prior experience working in a remote, cross-functional agency setup

- Proven track record of optimizing and scaling paid media campaigns with monthly budgets ranging from $500 - 1,000 USD

- Strong experience across Google Ads channels, including Search, Shopping, Performance Max, and YouTube

- Working knowledge of Meta Ads for performance support, including audience targeting, creative testing, and budget pacing

- Demonstrated ability to interpret performance data and translate insights into clear optimization and scaling actions

- Experience managing multiple client accounts with varying objectives, timelines, and KPIs

- Comfortable working UK business hours and collaborating with UK-based stakeholders



Nice-to-Have



- Experience supporting hospitality, especially brick-and-mortar businesses

- Familiarity with GA4, Looker Studio, or similar reporting and analytics platforms



Key Qualities



Detail-Oriented - Consistently ensures accuracy in campaign setup, data interpretation, and reporting

Action-Oriented - Quickly turns insights into execution and takes initiative to move tasks forward

Organized - Manages multiple campaigns, deadlines, and workflows with clear structure and efficiency

title: Financial Analyst (Junior Level)
description:
About Eightx



We provide Fractional CFO services for fast-growing eCommerce Brands and Agencies from Canada, the United States and the United Kingdom with one goal in mind:

To help eCommerce business owners scale their businesses with more cash and less stress.



This requires a broad range of skills including financial modeling, risk management, understanding of US/Canadian GAAP, financing, audit, investor relations and more.

We are small but growing fast which means you will get the chance to specialize and grow into future roles.

Lastly, as you might expect of a finance company, we work really hard when we need to, but we don’t work hard just for the sake of it. We don’t miss our kids’ concerts, we work out during the day and we usually sign off early on Fridays.





About the position



We are among the best in the world at what we do, and we hire elite staff to provide incredible service.

You’re an Elite and Enthusiastic/detail-oriented individual, to join our team as Financial Analyst. While 1-2 years of experience is advantageous, it's not mandatory – we value a strong work ethic and a willingness to learn. The work you do helps people truly unplug on vacation, have more time with their kids and get back to enjoying running their businesses.

You will be assisting a portfolio of clients around the world with financial modeling, budgeting, cash flow forecasting, scenario planning, variance analysis and more.



You will help with market research and trend analysis to give our clients ideas on how to improve their operations, financial structure and operating results.



You will be working in a wide range of tech/software platforms including Shopify, Quickbooks Online, Xero, Google Sheets, Google Docs, 
, Amazon Seller/Vendor, Rippling, Gusto and more.





What you will do



Time Zone: You will need to work 10am - 5pm Pacific Standard Time Zone (PST), with some flexibility for client needs.





Assist Senior Financial Analysts and CFO in:



Financial Modelling (we build forecasts that are realistic, robust and useful for decision-making)



Building 3-statement, dynamic financial models (income statement, balance sheet, cash flows)

Every month, as we meet with clients, you will adjust the models and communicate potential margin/cash flow issues.

You will field questions and requests from clients, working them into the models.

You will field questions and requests from potential Investors and adjust models as appropriate.

You will conduct market research so that our forecasts reflect potential reality

You will create scenarios for all models so that assumptions can be regularly tested.





Financial Reporting (we look backward so we can look forward to manage cash flow and mitigate risk)



Monthly reporting including variance analysis

Creating/updating KPI dashboards

Creating/maintaining/updating three statement financial forecasts (P&L, Cash Flows, Balance Sheet)

Cash flow monitoring and forecasting

Cohort Analysis





What you must have



You have a solid understanding of GAAP

You’re self-motivated

You can use independent judgment, problem-solve, be creative and answer questions

You’re comfortable adapting to change in a fast-paced and dynamic environment

You have outstanding interpersonal, verbal, and written communication skills

You handle ambiguity well and you take mistakes in stride (they are opportunities to learn)

Expertise in Financial Modeling and Forecasting: Demonstrated expertise in building and maintaining financial models, with a strong track record in financial reporting and cash flow forecasting.

Strong Analytical and Problem-Solving Skills: Ability to conduct market research and provide strategic insights, using independent judgment to solve problems creatively.

Proficiency in Financial Reporting and Variance Analysis: Solid understanding of GAAP and experience in creating and updating KPI dashboards.

Effective Communication Skills: Outstanding interpersonal, verbal, and written communication skills, facilitating effective interaction with clients and internal teams.

Self-Motivated and Proactive: Demonstrated commitment to continuous learning and self-improvement, quickly acquiring new skills and knowledge to enhance job performance.

Adaptability: Comfortable adapting to change in a fast-paced and dynamic environment, handling ambiguity well, and taking mistakes in stride as opportunities to learn.

Initiative: Regularly takes the initiative to suggest improvements, streamline processes, and contribute innovative ideas to benefit the team and organization.

Technical Proficiency: Proficiency in using a wide range of tech platforms, including Microsoft Excel, Shopify, QuickBooks Online, Xero, Google Sheets, and Google Docs.

Professional Designation: CPA, CFA, or similar professional designation, with significant experience in financial analysis.





Your experience and education



Fresh graduates are encouraged to apply.

1-2 years of experience in financial analysis is preferred but not mandatory.

Strong attention to detail and organizational skills.

Proficiency in data entry and basic accounting software.

Excellent communication skills.

Advanced MS Excel skills.





What you will get in return



? Full-time, competitive salary (commensurate with experience and education)

? Flexible working hours

? Remote work

? Generous vacation and time-off policies

? Benefits and bonuses





???? Short Video Submission – Early Screening

Financial Analyst (Junior Level)



As part of our initial screening process, candidates will be asked to submit a short video. This helps us assess communication skills, genuine interest in the role, and basic video/audio setup.

Video Guidelines

- Length: 2–3 minutes

- Format: Phone or webcam



Please address the following in your video:

- Why are you interested in this position?

- What do you know about Eightx?

- What is your ideal work environment?

- What are your key strengths?

- Where do you see yourself in five years?



We’re not judging video quality—just clear communication, thoughtful answers, and intentional applicants.





How to apply?



Apply through this link:

title: Senior Financial Analyst
description:
About Eightx

 

Senior Financial Analyst

 

We provide Fractional CFO services for fast-growing eCommerce Brands and Agencies from Canada, the United States and the United Kingdom with one goal in mind:

To help eCommerce business owners scale their businesses with more cash and less stress.

This requires a broad range of skills including financial modelling, risk management, understanding of US/Canadian GAAP, financing, audit, investor relations and more.

We are small but growing fast which means you will get the chance to specialize and grow into future roles such as Finance Manager or VP Finance.

Lastly, as you might expect of a finance company, we work really hard when we need to, but we don’t work hard just for the sake of it. We don’t miss our kids’ concerts, we work out during the day and we usually sign off early on Fridays.

About the position

We are among the best in the world at what we do, and we hire elite staff to provide incredible      service.

You’re an Elite and Experienced Senior Analyst that’s passionate about having a real impact on people’s lives. The work you do helps people truly unplug on vacation, have more time with their kids and get back to enjoying running their businesses.



You will be assisting a portfolio of clients around the world with financial modelling, budgeting, cash flow forecasting, scenario planning, variance analysis and more.



You will help with market research and trend analysis to give our clients ideas on how to improve their operations, financial structure and operating results.



You will build 3-statement financial models from the ground up, then run and adjust them every month according to client’s actual results.



You will be working in a wide range of tech/software platforms including Shopify, Quickbooks Online, Xero, Google Sheets, Google Docs, 
, Amazon Seller/Vendor, Rippling, Gusto and more.



What you will do

Time Zone

• During your onboarding period (4 weeks) you will need to work in Vancouver, Canada time (PST).

• After onboarding, you will need to overlap partially with the Vancouver, Canada time zone from 10am-6pm PST / 1am-9am Manila time.

 

Financial Modelling (we build forecasts that are realistic, robust and useful for decision-making)

• Building 3-statement, dynamic financial models (income statement, balance sheet, cash flows)

• Every month, as we meet with clients, you will adjust the models and communicate potential margin/cash flow issues.

• You will field questions and requests from clients, working them into the models.

• You will field questions and requests from potential Investors and adjust models as appropriate.

• You will conduct market research so that our forecasts reflect potential reality

• You will create scenarios for all models so that assumptions can be regularly tested.



Financial Reporting (we look backward so we can look forward to manage cashflow and mitigate risk)



• Monthly reporting including variance analysis

• Creating/updating KPI dashboards

• Creating/maintaining/updating three statement financial forecasts (P&L, Cash Flows, Balance Sheet)

• Cash flow monitoring and forecasting



What you must have



• You’re an expert with Microsoft Excel

• You can turn around model updates quickly

• You have a solid understanding of GAAP

• You’re self-motivated

• You can use independent judgment, problem-solve, be creative and answer questions

• You’re comfortable adapting to change in a fast-paced and dynamic environment

• You have outstanding interpersonal, verbal, and written communication skills

• You handle ambiguity well and you take mistakes in stride (they are opportunities to learn)



Your experience and education



• You have 5+ years’ experience

• You have a Bachelor’s Degree (or Masters)

• You have a professional designation (Chartered Accountant, Chartered Business Valuator, etc)



What you will get in return

• Full-time, competitive salary (commensurate with experience and education)

• Flexible working hours

• Remote work (do you want to work from the South of France next summer? That’s where I plan to be as well.)

• Generous vacation and time-off policies

• Discounts at several of our brands

• Benefits and bonuses

 



Eightx is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.







Eightx Company Values



We are forward-thinking

We are always thinking about the future. We keep tabs on the economy, current trends in industries, and current best practices.



We know about problems and solutions before our clients do. We proactively suggest new ideas and opportunities. We proactively mitigate risk.

We are continually seeking ways to improve both ours and our clients' businesses. We are constantly innovating our own processes and the ways we deliver value to our clients.

 We are disciplined

 We do great work. Why?

 We double check. We ask for input. We review. We test. We verify.

We get up and take a walk around the block, so we can look at our work with "fresh eyes".

 We are literally the best at what we do.

 We are scrappy

 We figure shit out. We never throw our hands up and say "I don't know". We challenge the status quo.

 Compared to others, we get more done on tighter budgets.

 We work to improve client processes. We take time to understand client processes, we think of ways to improve client processes.

 We are client-centric

 Our clients are the core of our "Why". How do we live this core value?

?          we always schedule in our client's time zones

?          we work hard to make sure they feel valued 

?          we empathize when needed

?          we do our best to understand our clients needs, and then we meet them (we don't rely on scope or past processes only)

 We care deeply about our clients as people.

 Work can and should make our lives better

 Work should add to our quality of life, not take away from it. 

 While we work crazy hard sometimes we don't do it regularly. 

 We believe in flexibility. We work during those hours that we feel most energized and we work in the locations that allow us to live our best lives (france? the beach?).

 We EMBRACE each other

We embrace diversity and inclusivity, creating a workplace where everyone feels valued, respected, and empowered.

We are an equal-opportunity employer committed to embracing individuals of every race, gender, age, culture, nationality, sexualorientation and background.

We celebrate unique perspectives, encourage collaboration, and promote an environment where diversity thrives. Together, we build a strong and inclusive community that drives innovation, fosters personal growth, and reflects the richness of the world around us.

title: Senior Accountant
description:
Senior Accountant + Bookkeeper

About Eightx

We provide Fractional CFO services for fast-growing eCommerce Brands and Agencies from Canada, the United States and the United Kingdom with one goal in mind:

To help eCommerce business owners scale their businesses with more cash and less stress.

This requires a broad range of skills including financial modeling, risk management, understanding of US/Canadian GAAP, financing, audit, investor relations and more.

We are small but growing fast which means you will get the chance to specialize and grow into future roles such as Controller or Finance Manager.

Lastly, as you might expect of a finance company, we work really hard when we need to, but we don’t work hard just for the sake of it. We don’t miss our kids’ concerts, we work out during the day and we usually sign off early on Fridays.

About the position

You’re an experienced Accountant and Bookkeeper that’s passionate about having a real impact on people’s lives. The work you do helps people truly unplug on vacation, have more time with their kids and get back to enjoying running their businesses.

You will be assisting a portfolio of clients around the world with closing their month end financials, categorizing expenses, reconciling bank accounts and understanding their financials.

You will close client books two - ten business days from month end, accurately and efficiently.

You will be working in a wide range of tech/software platforms including Shopify, Quickbooks Online, Xero, Hubdoc, Dext, Google Sheets, Google Docs, 
, Amazon Seller/Vendor, Rippling, Gusto and more.



What you will do

Time Zone

? You will need to overlap partially with the Vancouver, Canada time zone and will work from 10am-6pm PST.





Month End Close 

? You will close client books’ two to ten business days after month end

? You will maintain proper working papers for fixed assets, loans, prepaids and other accrual accounts

? You will make assumptions and estimates without all necessary information

? You will post accruals that should cover missing, but expected, expenses.



Bookkeeping (the foundation of all financial excellence)



? You will do weekly bookkeeping for your clients

? You will use rules to auto-categorize as much as possible

? You will use Hubdoc or Dext to attach receipts to transactions

? You will create or adjust charts of accounts to match our internal systems and client needs

? You will do payroll for Canadian or United States clients

? You will handle all bookkeeping needs for your clients



Compliance 

? You will use ensure clients stay up to date with all regulatory filings (sales tax, payroll, corporate, etc)



Reporting

? You will prepare weekly flash reports to send to your clients





What you must have



? You were an auditor in a public practice role

? You have a solid understanding of US or Canadian GAAP

? You’re self-motivated

? You can use independent judgment, problem-solve, be creative and answer questions

? You’re comfortable adapting to change in a fast-paced and dynamic environment

? You have outstanding interpersonal, verbal, and written communication skills

? You handle ambiguity well and you take mistakes in stride (they are opportunities to learn)



Your experience and education



? You have 3+ years experience in a bookkeeping role

? You have 2+ years experience in an auditing role 

? You have a Bachelor’s Degree (or Masters) 

? You’re a CPA or CA (Philippines, US, Canada, England, etc)



What you will get in return

? Full-time, competitive salary (commensurate with experience and education)

? Flexible working hours 

? Remote work 

? Generous vacation and time-off policies

? Benefits and bonuses





How to apply



If you think you’re a good fit, we’d love for you to apply. Click the link below which will take you to a typeform where you can answer a few questions and upload your resume and cover letter.



Apply here -> 



Eightx is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.







Eightx Company Values

 We are forward-thinking

We are always thinking about the future. We keep tabs on the economy, current trends in industries, and current best practices.



We know about problems and solutions before our clients do. We proactively suggest new ideas and opportunities. We proactively mitigate risk.

We are continually seeking ways to improve both ours and our clients' businesses. We are constantly innovating our own processes and the ways we deliver value to our clients.

 We are disciplined

 We do great work. Why?

 We double check. We ask for input. We review. We test. We verify.

We get up and take a walk around the block, so we can look at our work with "fresh eyes".

 We are literally the best at what we do.

 We are scrappy

 We figure shit out. We never throw our hands up and say "I don't know". We challenge the status quo.

 Compared to others, we get more done on tighter budgets.

 We work to improve client processes. We take time to understand client processes, we think of ways to improve client processes.

 We are client-centric

 Our clients are the core of our "Why". How do we live this core value?

?          we always schedule in our client's time zones

?          we work hard to make sure they feel valued 

?          we empathize when needed

?          we do our best to understand our clients needs, and then we meet them (we don't rely on scope or past processes only)

 We care deeply about our clients as people.

 Work can and should make our lives better

 Work should add to our quality of life, not take away from it. 

 While we work crazy hard sometimes we don't do it regularly. 

 We believe in flexibility. We work during those hours that we feel most energized and we work in the locations that allow us to live our best lives (france? the beach?).

 We EMBRACE each other

We embrace diversity and inclusivity, creating a workplace where everyone feels valued, respected, and empowered.

We are an equal-opportunity employer committed to embracing individuals of every race, gender, age, culture, nationality, sexualorientation and background.

We celebrate unique perspectives, encourage collaboration, and promote an environment where diversity thrives. Together, we build a strong and inclusive community that drives innovation, fosters personal growth, and reflects the richness of the world around us.

title: Product Page Template & Funnel Strategist (GemPages Expert)
description:
We are not looking for a designer.

We are looking for someone who understands how to build a funnel that makes strategic and psychological sense.



This role is purely focused on:



• Product page templates

• Funnels that lead into the product page

• Messaging that clearly defines the problem

• Structure that convincingly presents the solution



Everything must make sense strategically — not just visually.



What You’ll Be Responsible For:



• Building high-converting product page templates in GemPages

• Creating pre-sell funnels that logically lead into the product page

• Structuring the correct flow: hook ? problem ? agitation ? solution ? proof ? offer

• Organizing messaging so the narrative is clear and persuasive

• Building sections with clear conversion intent (no random blocks)

• Creating funnels that persuade emotionally and rationally



What We Expect:



• Proven experience with GemPages

• Strong understanding of direct response marketing

• You understand why funnels convert (consumer psychology)

• You can explain the reasoning behind your structure

• Experience with ad ? pre-sell ? product page flows

• Understanding of problem-awareness levels



 Not a Fit If:



• You only focus on making pages look “nice”

• You don’t have real funnel experience

• You don’t understand how messaging impacts conversion



???? How to Apply:



Please send:



- 2–3 funnels you have built

- A short explanation of why each funnel is structured the way it is

- Your rate (per template or hourly)

- Your availability

- We are looking for a long-term collaboration.



Only apply if you have real experience building conversion-driven funnels.

title: E-commerce UI/UX & Website Designer (Headless DTC)

Hike is scaling toward mid-to-high eight-figure DTC revenue supported by a global headless operations system that ensures uptime, fast deploys, and continuous experimentation.

Strategic CRO direction and experimentation roadmap are owned by Operations Leadership and the Head of Growth.

This role focuses on fast, high-quality execution that enables revenue optimization.



- Cross-Channel Alignment with



- Collaborate closely with the
 Designer to ensure:



- Consistent campaign messaging



- Unified promotional storytelling



- Cohesive visual tone across website and



Ownership clarity:

 Designer owns all
 creatives

Headless Design Collaboration:

- Work closely with headless developers for accurate implementation



- Maintain design consistency across global storefronts



- Support fast deploy cycles and launch timelines



Success Metrics (First 90 Days):



- Clear improvements in mobile UX clarity on key pages



- Faster design-to-deploy turnaround for launches



- Consistent, high-quality campaign banners and landing visuals



- Strong collaboration across Ops, Growth,
, and Dev

Must-Have Qualifications:

- Strong portfolio showing clean, conversion-focused layouts



- Solid mobile-first UX understanding

Nice to Have:

- Understanding of consumer psychology in ecommerce



- Experience supporting promotions, launches, or seasonal campaigns



Reporting & Collaboration:



Reports to:

COO / Head of Store & Business Operations



Works closely with:

-
 Designer (campaign alignment)

What Success Looks Like at Hike:



You help transform the website from a functional storefront into a clear, high-converting shopping experience.



Your work directly supports:



- Higher conversion rate

title: Operations & Projects Coordinator
description:
Salary: 24,000 – 28,000/month (full-time)

Location: Remote / PH-Based

Hours: 40 hours / week

Start: Immediate



About the Role

We’re looking for a highly proactive, execution-driven Operations & Projects Coordinator to support our growing team. This role is all about getting things done—turning rough ideas into polished resources, implementing initiatives independently, and keeping the business running smoothly.



In your first 60–90 days, you’ll take on projects from start to finish, helping the core team focus on strategy while you ensure initiatives are executed flawlessly.



This role is perfect for someone who thrives in a fast-paced environment, takes ownership of tasks, and enjoys seeing tangible results from their work.



Key Responsibilities

A. Project Execution

- Build and update guides, resources, programs, and internal documents.

- Implement initiatives based on direction from the core team.

- Take full ownership of assigned projects and ensure timely completion without needing constant guidance.



B. Research & Documentation

- Conduct market research for potential expansion, leagues, requirements, and opportunities.

- Maintain organized internal documentation for processes, programs, and resources.



C. Operations Support

- Assist with content execution, reminders, document prep, and other administrative overflow tasks as needed.

- Help the team maintain smooth day-to-day operations.



Outputs Matter: You’ll be measured by the quality and timeliness of your project execution, not just task completion.



Skills & Qualifications

- Highly proactive; notices gaps and acts without being told.

- Strong written communication and basic copywriting for resources.

- Comfortable with Google Workspace (required), Meta Suite and ClickUp or similar project management tools.

- Basic understanding of social media platforms and content management.

- Organized and structured, able to manage multiple projects simultaneously.

- Willingness to quickly learn about our business and the football industry.

- Able to take rough notes or ideas and turn them into polished, usable outputs independently.





What This Role Is NOT

- You will NOT be responsible for strategy, high-level decision-making, or managing people.

- You will NOT run operations or player onboarding.

- You will NOT handle sales, closing, or direct player interactions unless explicitly instructed.

- Your main focus is execution and follow-through, ensuring projects and initiatives are delivered efficiently and effectively.



Why Work With Us

- Be part of a lean, high-performing team where your work makes a visible impact.

- Gain exposure to business operations, strategy, and player management.

- Learn the ins and outs of the football industry while growing your skills.

- Opportunity to take on more responsibility and lead initiatives as the business scales.

- No traffic! Remote work environment with a strong culture of learning and ownership.



Attention to detail matters in this role.

Please include the words “two thousand twenty-six” in your application to confirm you’ve read the full description.

***PLEASE READ ON HOW TO APPLY***

title: Executive / Operations Assistant
description:
About Digibeacon - Digibeacon is a solutions partner that helps organizations streamline their operations through structured implementation of modern work management and cloud-based platforms. We work with enterprise and growing organizations to translate business processes into scalable systems—combining licenses, implementation, and ongoing support. Our work goes beyond tool deployment. We focus on successful adoption, operational clarity, and long-term value realization.



About the Role - As an Executive / Operations Assistant, you will work closely with leadership and cross-functional teams to keep customer projects, internal operations, and deliverables moving—without things falling through the cracks.

You will be part of a fast-paced IT services / SaaS environment, supporting customer projects, internal operations, and team coordination.



This Role Is Not for Everyone - We are not looking for someone who waits for instructions or simply executes tasks assigned to them. We are looking for a self-starter who thinks ahead, understands the bigger picture, and takes ownership.



What You’ll Be Responsible For

1. Work closely with cross-functional teams (Sales, Customer Solutions, Service Delivery, Marketing)

2. Track and coordinate customer projects and internal deliverables

3. Anticipate needs, identify gaps, and propose solutions before issues arise

4. Ensure quality, completeness, and accuracy of work before escalation is needed

5. Organize documentation, schedules, and reports

6. Support leadership with coordination, follow-ups, and operational visibility

7. Help improve processes and how teams work together



What We’re Looking For

1. Proven experience in a fast-paced IT services or SaaS company

2. Experience supporting customer projects and operational deliverables

3. Strong analytical and critical thinking skills

4. A self-starter mindset—you don’t wait to be told what to do

5. Ability to manage multiple priorities and projects at the same time

6. You work well with cross-functional teams, understand the broader business context, and are highly detail-focused—proactively ensuring quality before issues escalate

7. Strong communication and follow-through



What You’ll Need

1. A desktop or laptop with decent specs capable of running multiple applications for virtual meetings and presentations

2. A quiet home workspace

3. A noise-cancelling headset

4. A stable high-speed internet connection.



Why Join Digibeacon?

1. Competitive compensation package

2. 100% remote work setup with a collaborative and results-driven team

3. Be part of a growing company at the forefront of SaaS and digital transformation



How to Apply

1. To process your application, please complete the sign-up form below.

2. We only process applicants who complete the form.

3. Apply here: 
.com/digibeaconcareers (Use this form to apply)

title: Social Media Manager and Video Editor
description:
We are a family-owned and operated real estate buyer’s agent business in Australia, run primarily as a husband-and-wife team, and we’re looking for a reliable and self-driven co-worker to support our social media and video content. This role is for 4 hours per day and will begin with a one-month paid weekly trial period.



What you’ll be doing:

Edit and post 5 short-form videos per day to Instagram and automatically shared to

The videos through Google Drive we provide will be very raw, long-form footage that has not been trimmed or edited

Your role includes identifying strong 
nts, cutting clips, adding captions, and basic formatting

Create and post an additional 4 stories per day

Manage all incoming DMs and proactively send DMs to all new followers, using scripts to start conversations and identify potential interest and setting them up for a phone call.

We provide suggested scripts, along with our business DNA and brand voice via ChatGPT

Actively comment and engage on relevant posts from local selling agents and industry accounts to increase visibility and brand awareness

Suggest content ideas and angles we should be filming to improve engagement

We also provide documents to guide content direction



What a typical day looks like:

Approximately 3 to 3.5 hours editing and preparing video content

Approximately 0.5 to 1 hour managing comments and DMs, engaging on other accounts (including selling agents’ content), and scheduling posts

We don’t mind when you work during the day, as long as the agreed outputs are delivered consistently 



How we work:

We are not looking for someone who needs to be micro-managed

We run an active business and will not be reviewing or commenting on every video

Instructions will be provided upfront or through videos provided

Ongoing guidance and adjustments will be given when needed, not on every post

Starting out consistency and volume matter more than perfection in this role



What we’re looking for:

Experience turning raw video footage into engaging short-form content

Proficiency with video editing tools (please specify which tools you use in your application)

Experience managing Instagram and
 accounts

Bonus if you have some familiarity with ad-style content for
/Instagram Ads

We handle all ad setup and backend ourselves



Trial & next steps:

The first month will be a paid trial period and paid weekly

In your application, please include:

The video editing tools you use

Your experience cutting long-form videos into short-form content

Links to Instagram/Facebook pages you have managed and helped grow (if available)

Include links to two specific English speaking video posts or reels you’ve edited, along with a brief description of the outcome (such as engagement or follower growth).

Why this role interests you

How your past experience makes you a good fit for this role

Shortlisted applicants will be sent a test video to edit, which you may send back watermarked



Bonuses:

We offer performance-based bonuses on top of the hourly rate when leads generated through social media DMs progress to a phone call with us and ultimately sign up as clients.

title: Xero Setup Specialist & Trainer (Expert Level – Remote, Philippines)
description:
We are seeking an exceptional Xero expert to lead the complete setup, optimisation, and training process for our accounting systems.



This is not a basic bookkeeping role. We are looking for someone who deeply understands Xero architecture, financial workflows, reporting structures, and best-practice configuration — and who can confidently teach and guide a business owner in using it effectively.



???? About the Role



You will be responsible for:



Conducting a full audit of our current Xero setup (or leading a fresh setup if required)

Designing and implementing a best-practice chart of accounts

Structuring tracking categories aligned with business operations

Optimising bank feeds, automation rules, and reconciliations

Setting up invoices, bills, payroll (if applicable), and expense workflows

Configuring financial reporting dashboards for decision-making

Ensuring clean, scalable systems aligned with business growth

In addition to setup, you will:

Train and coach the founder on how to confidently use Xero

Create simple SOPs and Loom videos where helpful

Provide structured walkthrough sessions (live training)

Answer ongoing technical and workflow questions

Recommend improvements proactively

This is both a technical implementation and education role.



???? Required Experience



3+ years working extensively inside Xero

Proven experience setting up Xero accounts from scratch

Strong understanding of:

Chart of accounts structure

Tracking categories

Reporting & financial statements

Bank reconciliation best practices

Automation rules & integrations

Experience working with Australian businesses (highly preferred)

Excellent English communication skills (written and verbal)

Ability to explain financial systems clearly and confidently



???? Ideal Candidate



You are:



Extremely detail-oriented

Process-driven and organised

Proactive in suggesting improvements

Comfortable teaching and guiding non-accountants

Strategic in how you structure financial systems

Reliable and responsive

You don’t just “use Xero” — you understand how to architect it properly.



???? Scope & Engagement



Remote position (Philippines-based)



Initial project: Full Xero audit & optimisation



Ongoing: Training + advisory support



Flexible hours, but must overlap partially with Australian time zones



Potential for long-term working relationship



???? To Apply



Please include:



A brief overview of your Xero experience



Examples of Xero setups you have implemented



Your experience working with Australian businesses (if applicable)



Your hourly rate



A short Loom video explaining how you would approach setting up Xero for a growing service-based business



We are looking for someone exceptional — not average.



If you are a true Xero expert who enjoys building clean systems and teaching others how to use them properly, we would love to hear from you.

title: Video Editor For Dental Videos on YouTube
description:
I have a YouTube channel, and I need a new editor for my dental videos that can use DaVinci Resolve Cloud. You will also need a lot of storage space for editing off of proxy files. I do about 3 Videos a month. Each video is about $90 for videos that are less than 15 minutes long, and I offer up to $180 for really long videos. Videos are usually about 7 to 14 minutes long.



I also offer bonuses for videos that don't require extensive editing. For example, if the video pay is $90 and I don't have to make many revisions, I offer a bonus of $45.



My process involves: 1- downloading the proxies from my server. 2- chopping up the A-roll 3- Adding B-roll. 4- Adding graphics, Texts, Titles, Transitions, and Music. 5- Changing revisions that I send.



My Channel is called Baseline Dental on YouTube to see the videos that have been done on my channel already. You can expect to make $300 to $400 at first and, after a few months, about $400 to $600 or possibly more if I have other projects to do.



I also have other ways to make money. Sometimes, I offer jobs like creating dental shorts and chopping footage into smaller clips. I also have other YouTube Channels that sometimes need help.



** I also have a Channel for my daughter Brielle Buck. If you can edit with AI I would also need someone for those videos that would pay more too.

title: Thumbnail Designer
description:
I have 3 YouTube channels, and I need a Thumbnail Designer for my videos. They must be made with Photoshop. I do about 5 to 6 videos a month . It is $120 for each thumbnail.



My process involves: 1- download videos once I am done editing. 2- come up with a captivating thumbnail 3- upload finished files and photoshop files 4- Change revisions that I request.



My Channels are called Baseline Dental and The Proposal on YouTube if you want to see videos and thumbnails that have been done on my channel already. You can expect to make around $120 for what I think is about 8 hours of work per month.



I also have other ways to make money in the future. Sometimes, I offer other jobs to make a little more money. I also have other YouTube Channels that sometimes need help.

title: Quantity Surveyor
description:
Position: Quantity Surveyor 

Salary: Negotiable, starting at $9/hr

Job Type: Part-time (20 hours per week)



Your main responsibilities will be to:

- Price UK residential construction projects, including extensions and refurbishments

- Read and interpret residential construction drawings confidently

- Print drawings to A3 where required

- Measure works using: Scaled drawings, Given dimensions, Scaling from drawings where dimensions are missing

- Use appropriate measurement tools, including: Physical scale rulers, Digital take-off software

- Produce detailed cost breakdowns for each project

- Prepare comprehensive client-ready proposals using the company’s provided format

- Follow internal pricing processes and tools

- Document pricing templates for future reference

- Work in a highly organised and methodical manner

- Follow established SOPs, structured workflows, and version control practices

- Learn new systems as required

- Be proactive in day-to-day work by: Flagging issues or inconsistencies, Asking clear, intelligent questions, Making practical suggestions for improvement

- Use the company’s proprietary pricing software for live pricing work

- Provide structured feedback on the pricing software

- Identify gaps, bugs, or improvement opportunities

- Develop into a confident power user of the pricing system over time



You MUST:

- Be highly organised and methodical

- Be confident using software and learning new systems

- Be proactive



Must-have qualifications:

- Degree in Civil Engineering or any construction-related courses

- Experience in pricing UK residential construction projects

- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills

- Skilled in using estimating and pricing platforms 

- Skilled in creating comprehensive, client-ready proposals

- Background in Quantity Surveying, Estimating, Construction Management, Engineering, or a similar technical construction discipline

- Strong understanding of residential construction methods, sequencing of works, labour vs. materials, and trade packages

- Able to interpret architectural drawings, structural drawings, and specification notes



Additional, nice-to-have qualifications:

- Experience with UK building regulations and standards

- Familiarity with software tools such as Buildertrend, CostX, or similar estimating platforms

- Experience creating templates for repeatable pricing workflows



To apply:

Please include the link to your Resume in your application.

title: VoIP Infrastructure Lead (Vonage / SIP)
description:
Company: WorkWise Auto Solutions

Location: Remote (Philippines)

Type: Full-time

Salary: Competitive, based on experience



The Project 

We're building out a multi-tenant voice communication platform for our clients, automotive workshops across Australia. End users will have flexibility: web app, mobile app, or physical desk phones for their front-desk staff.

We've chosen Vonage as our backbone. We need someone who can own the VoIP/telephony layer end-to-end: architect it, build it, and run it.





What You'll Be Doing

- Design and build our SIP trunking infrastructure using Vonage's APIs and SIP services

- Provision and configure desk phones at scale (Yealink, Polycom, Cisco, Grandstream, whatever fits)

- Integrate physical phones alongside our web/mobile softphone options into a unified system

- Manage multi-tenant voice routing, each client needs their own numbers, extensions, and call flows

- Troubleshoot call quality issues (latency, jitter, codec problems, NAT/firewall headaches)

- Work with our dev team to integrate voice into our broader platform (webhooks, call events, recordings, IVR logic via NCCO)

- Document configurations, runbooks, and provisioning processes

- Own it ongoing, this isn't a one-and-done build; you'll manage and evolve the system



What We're Looking For

   Must Have:

      - Deep experience with SIP protocol and VoIP systems

      - Hands-on work with desk phone provisioning (auto-provisioning, config files, MAC-based setup)

      - Familiarity with SIP trunking concepts (registration, authentication, codecs, NAT traversal)

      - Understanding of VoIP networking (QoS, firewall rules for SIP/RTP, STUN/TURN)

      - Ability to diagnose call quality issues and know your way around packet captures if needed

      - Comfortable working remotely and asynchronously with a distributed team

   

   Ideally, You Also Have:

       - Experience with Vonage APIs (Voice API, SIP trunking, Programmable SIP) or similar platforms (Twilio, Plivo, etc.)

       - Worked with PBX systems (FreePBX, Asterisk, 3CX) in the past

       - Familiarity with NCCO (Nexmo Call Control Objects) or similar call flow scripting

       - Experience in multi-tenant environments, you understand the complexity of managing voice for many clients

       - Some exposure to WebRTC for browser-based calling



About WorkWise Auto Solutions

We help automotive workshops run more smoothly with Virtual Service Advisors and smart operations tools. Voice communication is a critical piece; our clients talk to their customers constantly. We need the phones just to work.

Small team. Real problems to solve. Autonomy to do it your way.



Benefits

 - Competitive salary

 - Work from home – fully remote role

 - Ongoing professional development and career growth opportunities

 - Opportunities for advancement within the company

 - A supportive and collaborative team environment



To Apply

 Follow this form, thoroughly read, and go through the steps:

   
  



This is a build-it-then-run-it role. If you like owning infrastructure, we'd like to talk. ????

title: Social Media Video Content Creator
description:
Got it. Here's the JD:



JOB TITLE: Part-Time Social Media Content Creator — Short-Form Video & Graphics

ABOUT US: Shopperoo is a price comparison tool that shows shoppers the cheapest place to buy anything across Amazon, Walmart, Target, Kroger, Wayfair, Home Depot, and Lowes. We have 20,000+ daily users and are growing fast.

THE ROLE: You'll create the content that powers our social media presence — short-form videos (Reels, TikToks, YouTube Shorts) and static graphics that make price comparison data feel shareable, surprising, and scroll-stopping. You won't be posting or managing accounts — we have a separate tea
mber handling distribution and community engagement. Your job is to make great content and hand it off.

WHAT YOU'LL DO:



Create short-form video content (Reels, TikToks, Shorts) — screen recordings with text overlays, green screen, trending audio, Stitch/Duet-ready formats. 5-8 videos/week.

Create static price comparison graphics optimized for Instagram,
, Pinterest, and X. 5-10 graphics/week.

Stay on top of trending formats, sounds, and hooks — flag ideas proactively when you see something we should jump on.

Turn raw price data we provide into visually compelling content (we give you the numbers, you make them pop).

Occasional one-off creative — Pinterest pins, Substack header images, Reddit-ready data visualizations.



MUST-HAVE SKILLS:



Strong short-form video editing (CapCut, Premiere Rush, or similar) — you know pacing, text timing, hooks, and trending formats

Canva or equivalent for static graphics

Eye for what performs on TikTok and Instagram — you scroll these platforms and understand what stops thumbs

Ability to make data/numbers feel visual and interesting, not dry

Strong English copy for on-screen text and captions

Reliable turnaround — we move fast and content has a short shelf life



NICE TO HAVE:



Experience creating content in the deals, coupons, personal finance, or shopping space

Motion graphics or light animation skills

Familiarity with TikTok Stitch/Duet creation

Pinterest graphic design experience



HOURS: 5-10 hours/week, flexible schedule. Async communication — no set hours, just consistent output.

TO APPLY: Send us:



2-3 sample Reels or TikToks you've created (links or files)

2-3 sample static graphics (Canva or otherwise)

A 2-sentence note on what makes a price comparison post go viral

title: Finance Loan Processor
description:
We are an Australian based company seeking an experienced Finance Loan Processor to support our Finance Broking Operations team.



This is a full time, long term, work from home role for a highly organised finance professional based in the Philippines who has strong experience supporting mortgage brokers, lenders, or finance teams in Australian or international markets.



This role focuses on end to end loan processing, application tracking, lender and solicitor coordination, client updates, and settlement support. The role also plays a key part in liaising with brokers, referral partners, lenders, and clients to ensure smooth progress of applications, clear communication, and on time settlements across all files.



Working Hours and Setup:

-Full time role

-8.30 am to 5.30 pm AEST with a one hour break

-Work from home

-Two monitors required

-Stable high speed internet required



Key Responsibilities:

-Provide updates for clients every 2-3 days on their home loan application  

-Contact lenders to make sure the application is processed as promptly  

-Request any additional documents from clients upon request from lender  

-Make sure deposits are available and paid promptly  

-Ensure outgoing and incoming lenders are aligned to ensure settlements take place when due  

-Keep referral partners informed on the progress of loan application  

-Inform solicitor & RM of formal approval of any purchases  

-Confirm with lender that the approval is correct (interest rate and loan amount) 



Required Experience and Skills:

-Likes to be part of team, though can work autonomously

-Motivated self-starter with proven initiative 

-Strong written, presentation, verbal and interpersonal communication skills 

-High level of problem solving  

-Evidence of the practice of a high level of confidentiality 

-Ability to provide support to other tea
mbers, when required. 



Salary and Benefits:

title: Senior YouTube Video Editor & Channel Manager (Experienced Only)
description:
We are looking for an experienced Filipino YouTube professional who can handle both high-quality video editing and full YouTube channel backend management.



This is not a beginner role.

We are not looking for brand new editors or new YouTubers.



You must have 3–5+ years of proven experience working with YouTube channels and understand the platform deeply.



Responsibilities



• Edit long-form YouTube videos with strong pacing, flow, and viewer retention

• Create engaging, click-worthy thumbnails (YouTube-optimized, not generic)

• Upload and properly optimize videos (titles, descriptions, tags, chapters, metadata)

• Understand and apply YouTube SEO and algorithm strategy

• Repurpose long-form content into YouTube Shorts and short-form clips for other platforms

• Assist with channel growth strategy, retention improvements, and monetization optimization

• Maintain consistency, organization, and performance tracking on the backend



Requirements



• 3–5+ years experience working with YouTube channels (personal or client channels)

• Strong understanding of YouTube’s algorithm, CTR, retention, and SEO

• Experience with monetization strategies and audience growth

• Skilled in video editing software (Premiere Pro, Final Cut, DaVinci Resolve, or similar)

• Skilled in thumbnail design (Photoshop, Canva, or equivalent)

• Experience creating short-form content (Shorts, Reels, TikTok-style edits)

• Reliable, detail-oriented, and proactive

• Able to work independently and manage multiple content workflows



Important



If you are a new editor, new YouTuber, or still learning YouTube basics, this role is not for you.



We are looking for someone with depth, experience, and proven results.



Please be ready to share:

• Portfolio of edited videos

• Channels you’ve worked on

• Examples of thumbnails

• Brief explanation of your YouTube experience

title: Shopify Brand Designer & Storytelling Strategist
description:
TYPE OF EMPLOYMENT



Contract / Freelance (Open to Long-Term)



JOB DESCRIPTION



I’m looking for a skilled Shopify professional who understands brand storytelling, visual identity, and symbolic messaging, not just surface-level design.



Allegedly Enlighten is a clothing brand built around a core truth:

Reality is layered. Identity is constructed. We exist inside illusion, samsara, and systems that shape perception (what many would call “the matrix”).



This brand is not about preaching or explaining everything explicitly.

The people who get it will recognize the message immediately.

Everyone else will simply see mystical, symbolic, and visually striking designs that feel meaningful even if they can’t fully explain why.



Your role will be to rebuild the brand image and Shopify store so it tells a cohesive, honest story through:



Visual hierarchy



Layout and flow



Copy tone



Symbolism and subtle narrative cues



Key Responsibilities



Rebuild and refine the Shopify storefront (design + structure)



Develop a cohesive brand aesthetic that feels mystical, grounded, and intentional



Help translate abstract philosophical ideas into clean, wearable branding



Improve product page storytelling (without over-explaining)



Ensure the site feels premium, intentional, and emotionally resonant



Optimize for clarity, flow, and conversion without losing meaning



What I’m Looking For



Strong Shopify experience (themes, layout, UX)



A good eye for symbolism, minimalism, and narrative-driven design



Comfort working with philosophical, spiritual, or metaphysical concepts



Someone who understands that less explanation often creates more impact



Ability to collaborate and interpret vision, not just follow instructions



This is not a generic streetwear brand.

This is a signal.

title: Lead Generation & Social Media Specialist (Full-Time, Remote)
description:
About Santelo

Santelo Oy is a Finland-based technology and consulting company working with startups and growth-stage companies. We help companies build software, AI-powered solutions, and scalable digital products.



We operate with clear processes, modern tools, and a long-term mindset.





Role Summary

We are hiring a full-time Lead Generation & Social Media Specialist.



This role combines two closely related responsibilities:

- Primary focus: Lead generation and prospecting

- Secondary focus: Light B2B marketing and social media support



Most of your time will be spent on finding and qualifying leads.





Primary Responsibilities (Main Focus)

Lead Generation & Prospecting

- Source and qualify B2B leads, mainly via:

- LinkedIn Sales Navigator

- LinkedIn search

- Other effective prospecting tools you are experienced with

- Identify decision-makers (founders, C-level, CTOs)

- Ensure leads meet agreed quality criteria

- Push all qualified leads into Santelo’s internal system

- Keep lead data clean, accurate, and structured





Secondary Responsibilities (Supporting Role)



Social Media & Content Support

- We already have tools for:

- Blog content creation

- Social media post generation



Your responsibility is to:

- Review, edit, and validate content before publishing

- Ensure language quality, clarity, and professional tone

- Schedule and publish posts (LinkedIn, X etc.)

- No heavy creative writing required — focus is on quality control and consistency





Requirements

- Strong written English (professional and clear)

- Proven experience in B2B lead generation

- Practical experience with LinkedIn Sales Navigator

- Ability to review and improve AI-assisted or tool-generated content

- Structured, detail-oriented working style

- Able to work independently and follow defined processes





Nice to Have

- Experience with IT, SaaS, or consulting companies

- Understanding of B2B sales and outbound workflows

- Experience working with European or US clients

- Familiarity with CRM or internal lead systems





Working Conditions & Compensation

- Full-time, fully remote position

- Clear priorities and direct communication with the founder

- Competitive monthly salary based on experience

- Opportunity to grow responsibility over time

title: WordPress Designer & Developer (Figma-to-WP)
description:
Role Overview

Our agency is looking for a WordPress Designer & Developer who lives at the intersection of high-end UI/UX and clean technical implementation. You won't just be "tweaking templates," you will be responsible for designing bespoke digital experiences in Figma and translating them into high-performance WordPress websites.



The Agency Workflow



Discovery & Strategy: Distill client goals into visual concepts.

Design: Build comprehensive, responsive prototypes in Figma.

Development: Develop the approved design into a pixel-perfect WordPress site.

Launch: Ensure SEO readiness, speed optimization, and client handoff.



Technical Stack & Requirements



Design: Mastery of Figma (Auto-layout, components, and prototyping are essential).

Development: Expert-level experience with Elementor Pro or custom block-based development.

Web Standards: Deep understanding of CSS/HTML and responsive design principles.

Optimization: Proven ability to hit Google Core Web Vitals (speed, accessibility, and SEO structure).

Agency Experience: Ability to manage multiple client projects simultaneously without sacrificing quality.



Please share a link to a Figma file and the corresponding live URL of the site you built from it. 



If you think you are the right person for this role, please create and send us a 1 minute video introducing yourself, share your background and why you would be the best person for this role. Please also forward your resume and your earliest available start date to Contact at umteencompany dot com. Candidates will not be interviewed if you do not send a 1 minute video.

title: Lead Generator
description:
Apply only via our Google Form: 





Position: Lead Generator

Position Type: Full-time

Company: Koscom Cable

Location: Remote

 



About Us



Koscom Cable is a nationwide telecom and fiber construction subcontractor serving leading ISPs and utility companies. We specialize in outside plant (OSP) and inside plant (ISP) construction, fiber splicing, drop bury, and cable fulfillment services. We’re expanding our business pipeline and looking for a proactive Lead Generator to help us identify and connect with more prospects:  primes, and subcontractors.



Role Overview



The Lead Generator will be responsible for researching, identifying, and reaching out new leads. You will use a combination of digital platforms (LinkedIn,
 campaigns,
 forums, Reddit discussions, and industry groups) to connect with decision-makers, introduce Koscom’s services, and set up meetings for our Sales Managers.



Key Responsibilities



Prospecting & Research

Identify target companies, primes, ISPs, and contractors in the telecom and utility sectors.

Use LinkedIn, industry directories, RFP platforms, and online communities to map out decision-makers.

Outreach & Engagement

Execute outreach campaigns across LinkedIn,
,
 groups, Reddit forums, RFP/bidding platforms.

Requirements

Strong knowledge of outreach tools.

Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English.

Ability to execute challenging searches.

Work directly with a growing team serving market leaders in the US, nationwide.

title: Personal Social Life VA
description:
Seeking a highly intuitive, organized, and tech-savvy Virtual Assistant to manage the dating and social ecosystem for a busy male professional. This isn't just a scheduling role; you will act as a "proxy" for the client—learning his voice, preferences, and logic to manage his social life with total autonomy and high integrity.



Key Responsibilities

- Profile Optimization: Manage and refine dating profiles (Tinder, Bumble, etc.) to ensure high-quality engagement.

- Inbound & Outbound Lead Management: Vet referrals and proactively browse/evaluate potential matches based on the client’s specific "ideal partner" criteria.

- Engagement & Ghostwriting: Handle initial outreach and ice-breaking conversations via WhatsApp and dating apps. You will build rapport and "get to know" candidates to save the client time.

- AI Training: Utilize and train LLMs (like ChatGPT) to mirror the client’s authentic persona and communication style.

- Logistics & Scheduling: Coordinate and confirm dates directly onto the client’s calendar.

- Reporting & Briefing: Provide weekly stats on funnel performance and deliver detailed "pre-date briefings" so the client is fully prepared for every meeting.



Desired Attributes

- High Emotional Intelligence (EQ): You are a natural "people person" who knows how to make others feel comfortable through text.

- Exceptional Judgment: You can learn a client’s logic so well that you can make decisions (Yes/No) on his behalf flawlessly.

- Tech-Fluent: Comfortable with dating app algorithms and experienced in using AI tools to enhance productivity.

- Discretion & Integrity: You will be handling deeply personal information; a high level of professional ethics is non-negotiable.

- Process-Oriented: You don’t just follow a task; you look for ways to make the system more efficient.



Technical Requirements

- Stable internet connection and high responsiveness during agreed-upon hours.

- Proficiency in WhatsApp, Google Calendar, and LLM tools (ChatGPT/Claude).

- Excellent written English (Native level).

title: Curriculum Specialist (Curriculum Development and Monitoring)
description:
Pomelo Academy is an online international school committed to delivering high-quality, globally aligned education through structured instructional systems and strong academic oversight. The institution emphasizes curriculum fidelity, teacher development, and accountable learning processes supported by data-driven monitoring.



ROLE OVERVIEW



The curriculum specialist serves as a curriculum developer and monitoring personnel, ensuring the creation of lesson materials and the integrity of curriculum implementation, consistency of instructional standards, and systematic oversight of the full homework lifecycle—assignment, submission, review, and documentation. The position bridges curriculum design and classroom execution while strengthening teacher capacity and academic accountability systems.



CORE RESPONSIBILITIES



A. Homework System Management (Supervisory Function)

- Develop and update homework implementation guidelines 

- Design assignments, instructional templates, and standardized grading rubrics to be used in classes.

- Conduct daily monitoring of the Homework Tracker and Missing Homework lists

- Review posted homework’s quality.

B. Curriculum Management

- Develop lesson materials for teachers on all subject areas.

- Collect EDBs from teachers and develop missing EDBs where gaps exist.

- Align and customize trial class EDBs based on student profiles, including differentiated homework expectations, and submit for Curriculum Leader approval



QUALIFICATIONS



Minimum of five years of teaching experience with demonstrated instructional effectiveness

Experience in curriculum coordination, instructional leadership, or academic operations

Strong background in teacher training, coaching, and quality assurance

Experience working within online or blended learning environments

Excellent organizational, monitoring, and documentation skills

High level of accountability and ability to manage high-responsibility tasks

Strong English communication skills, both written and spoken



COMPENSATION AND WORK ARRANGEMENT



Fully remote work environment (Preferably Morning Shift) 

Fixed salary with performance-based incentives

Opportunity to contribute to the development of structured academic systems within a growing international school

Requirements:



- Strong portfolio of AI fashion videos (mandatory)

- Experience in women’s fashion brands

- Understanding of ad creatives that convert

- Attention to detail (fabric physics, lighting, realism)



We are looking for long-term collaboration.

Only apply if you have real AI fashion video experience.

title: Are You A Lead Generation, Outbound Sales And Research Expert?
description:
Dear Professional:



We're looking to hire a positive, hard working lead generation and outbound sales account manager and VA to help us with lead generation and outbound sales. That includes research to generate leads for our
 marketing business.



You must be willing to:

- do research on local companies (USA)

- find phone numbers and
s (we have several tools you'll get access to also)

-
 (mailshake) and follow-up + call the businesses to introduce them to us (not so much selling per se, but making an introduction and invite them to our training videos, webinars, etc)

- find influencers that are authors, speakers, consultants that are noted personalities





Requirements:

- Must show examples of work done for lead generation

- Speak good English (since some calling is required)

- Be available during morning hours PST (we can work a schedule for you)

- Have relevant experience, but we will also train (but that should not be the main focus, you should be able to get up and running fast)

- Friendly, helpful, resourceful

- Be happy, positive and don't mind being educated, and learn our process - and be open to add your own experience and ideas



This will be a long term option for the right person, and we look forward to a great relationship with lots of good results, great learning, and a mutual partnership of progress and fun! :-)



We are in a fast growth mode, and need speed, detail and efficiency in all the work.



We're fun and also serious about success. We'd like to invite you to join in that effort. :-)



Thank you for reading this post.



P.S.

If you can show us how fast you can ramp up, we'll be very fortunate to have you. Speed = Success.



P.P.S.

You should also be open to run a "test project" (we will pay of course) - so we can see you in action! Thanks.

Thanks!
